trans-unit.source: If the option is enabled, options with filters will not be visible in the frontend
Define sorting in frontend. Sort by page sorting doesn't respect multiple mounts as sort

Select categories. Selected categories of the same type (e.g. ‘Degree’) are checked as alternatives (OR). If a category has subcategories (e.g. ‘Master’ with ‘Master of Arts’), these are automatically added to the list of alternatives. In addition, the pages found for each category type must also be able to be found in all other selected category types (AND).
